Standard: Only half an hour until we arrive. This 13 hour flight has been intense...
Good evening ladies and gentlemen. We will be arriving shortly at Shanghai Pudong Airport. The temperature in Shanghai is 29°C or 84°F.
For your safety, please make sure that your seat belts are tightly fastened.
Gèwèi kèhù, nǐmen hǎo. Wǒmen jiàng zài shànghǎi pǔdōng jīchǎng jiàngluò. Shànghǎi mùqián shèshì èrshíjiǔ dù, huáshì bāshísì dù. \n
Wèi nín de ānquán, qǐng jì shàng nín de ānquán dài.
Seems like it's time to buckle up for landing.
Please remember to fill out your immigration card before we land.
An immigration card? Huh?
So this is your first and last name, correct?\nFirst name: {$firstName} \nLast name: {$lastName}
Looks good!
Whoops! Let me change that!
Excuse me. Please make sure you fill out your first and last name on the arrival card.
Looks like we're about to land.
Looks like the plane to Shanghai is boarding soon. I had better call Alex to make sure she'll be ready to pick me up when I arrive.
Wèi!
Hmm... did I call the wrong number?
Wèi! Alex?
Hello! Alex?
Hey, it’s me, Alex! So excited you're finally coming! But listen, I have some bad news.
I wonder what the bad news could be...
Are you in trouble again?
Do I have to have to find another place to stay?
No silly, it’s not that. I just can’t make it to the airport to pick you up. I’ll tell you about it later, but something urgent came up - and it’s something I’ve been waiting for! \n
That's fine. I can get a cab or something.
What if I get lost!?
No way! I'm canceling my flight then.
Don't be ridiculous. You'll be fine.
Ok - I’m going to send you my address so write it down on paper or screenshot it. Remember, you won’t have access to data when you land in Shanghai.
Also, one of my roommates, David, should be at the apartment to greet you.

Good afternoon passengers. This is the pre-boarding announcement for flight 888 to Shanghai. We are now inviting those passengers with small children, and any passengers requiring special assistance, to begin boarding at this time.
Please have your boarding pass and identification ready. Regular boarding will begin in approximately ten minutes time. Thank you.
Sounds like you're boarding soon. You had better get going. Zàijiàn! I mean, bye!
Shanghai... here I come!
